charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_0100_1:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I didn’t expect to run into you here.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_0200_1:
Octillery and I came to the beach in search
of inspiration for the new ink-based dish
we’re developing.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_0300_1:
Did you know that Octillery ink can be used
as a cooking ingredient?
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0401_0500_1:
Excellent! Knowledge is the key ingredient to
making the world a better place, you know.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0401_0600_1:
And a chef needs both great knowledge and
great experience to bring out the ultimate flavor
of his ingredients!
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0402_0900_1:
In fact, you should be thankful that you learned
something new today! Knowledge is the key
ingredient to making the world a better place!
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_1100_1:
Apologies... Sometimes I get a bit carried away
when I talk about my passions.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_1200_1:
Discovering that I could use Octillery ink in my
cooking unlocked a whole new realm of culinary
possibility for me to pursue.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_1300_1:
I have a passion for bringing out the best in
things—both as a chef and as a Pokémon Trainer.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_1400_1:
And right now, my greatest passion is perfecting
this new Octillery-ink-based recipe—no matter
what it takes!
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0301_1500_1: You and Octillery seem really close.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0401_1600_1:
Indeed, we are! Octillery has helped me discover
a great many things since we first met...
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0401_1700_1:
I’m proud to call such a dependable Pokémon
my partner.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0302_1800_1: You’re really excited about this, huh?
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0402_1900_1:
Indeed! And Octillery is bubbling with enthusiasm
with me! He wants to perfect this dish almost as
much as I do.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0402_2000_1: I can count on him for anything.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2100_1:
It was fate that brought us together in the
first place.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2200_1:
One day, I went to the beach to search for
some fun, new ingredients with my Clawitzer.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2300_1:
We were about to stop and take a break when
all of a sudden, a wild Octillery lurched out at us
from among the rocks.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2400_1:
While we were battling, a bit of ink from its
Octazooka attack splashed me in the face.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2500_1:
I accidentally tasted some of it in the process,
and my goodness... It was like an explosion
of flavor!
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2600_1:
I’d heard of ink being used as a cooking ingredient
before, but this was the first time I had tasted
it myself.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2700_1:
In that instant, I felt like my eyes were
opened to a whole new world of food!
It was truly astounding!
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0401_2900_1:
Indeed. I believe Octillery and I are destined to
deliver an entirely new cuisine to the world.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0402_3100_1:
Well, we can’t have that, can we? You can’t win
Pokémon battles on an empty stomach.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_3400_1:
I think you and I were meant to have this
conversation about Octillery today.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_3500_1:
How would you like to be one of the first to
taste-test the new ink-based dish we’ve
been developing?
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_3600_1:
For a treasured guest like you, I’ll put my
heart into every last bite. I hope you enjoy it!
